Class RPGDataType

com.gmail.alexdion93.aeonrpg.data.type.RPGDataType
All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements RPGDataAligned, RPGDataNegative

    • getEntityProjectileValue

      public int getEntityProjectileValue​(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key)
      Fetches a value from the entity but use logic for projectile weapons. Projectile weapons use the stats from: All equipped armor The projectile weapon itself (bow, crossbow, trident, etc.) The projectile weapon's ammo or the unused hand (whichever hand the weapon isn't using)
      Parameters:
      entity - The target entity
      key - The namespaced key we're searching for
      Returns:
      An integer sum of all keys found

    • getEntityValue

      public int getEntityValue​(org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataHolder holder, org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key)
      Returns the amount of this data is present within an entity and its equipment.
      Parameters:
      holder - The persistent data holder.
      key - The namespaced key we're searching for
      Returns:
      The gathered value or 0.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - If the entity is null;

    • getNamespacedKey

      public org.bukkit.NamespacedKey getNamespacedKey()
      Returns the key tied to this data type.
      Returns:
      The key tied to this data type.

      Parameters:

      value - The amount we're setting the value to.
